title: Psycho
description: A Phoenix secretary embezzles $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run, and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.

title: The Apartment
description: A man tries to rise in his company by letting its executives use his apartment for trysts, but complications and a romance of his own ensue.

title: Spartacus
description: The slave Spartacus leads a violent revolt against the decadent Roman Republic.

title: La Dolce Vita
description: A series of stories following a week in the life of a philandering paparazzo journalist living in Rome.

title: L'Avventura
description: A woman disappears during a Mediterranean boating trip, and during the search, her lover and her best friend become attracted to each other.

title: Breathless
description: A small-time thief steals a car and impulsively murders a motorcycle policeman. Wanted by the authorities, he reunites with a hip American journalism student and attempts to persuade her to run away with him.

title: The Magnificent Seven
description: Seven gunfighters are hired by Mexican peasants to liberate their village from oppressive bandits.

title: Inherit the Wind
description: Based on a real-life case in 1925, two great lawyers argue the case for, and against, a Tennessee science teacher accused of teaching the theory of evolution.

title: Rocco and His Brothers
description: A widow and her five sons leave the countryside for Milan, where the brothers' lives and fortunes diverge.

title: The Virgin Spring
description: A father seeks revenge for the rape and murder of his daughter in medieval Sweden.

title: Peeping Tom
description: A young man murders women, using a movie camera to film their dying expressions of terror.

title: The Time Machine
description: A Victorian Englishman travels to the far future and finds that humanity has divided into two hostile species.

title: When a Woman Ascends the Stairs
description: A middle-aged bar hostess in Tokyo tries to maintain her independence and dignity while navigating financial struggles and societal expectations.

title: The Bad Sleep Well
description: A grieving son seeks revenge against the corrupt businessmen responsible for his father's death.

title: Two Women
description: A widow and her teenage daughter flee war-torn Rome for the countryside, where they face tragedy and violence.

title: The Naked Island
description: A family living on a small island without a source of water must struggle to survive by carrying buckets of water from the mainland.

title: Late Autumn
description: A widow tries to marry off her daughter with the help of her late husband's three friends.

title: Shoot the Piano Player
description: A washed-up classical pianist turned bar player gets dragged into trouble by his criminal brothers.

title: Saturday Night and Sunday Morning
description: A rebellious factory worker tries to find fun and romance in a dreary industrial town.

title: Le Trou
description: Prisoners in a Paris jail plot an elaborate escape by digging a tunnel, but their plan is threatened by a new cellmate.

title: The Cloud-Capped Star
description: A selfless young woman sacrifices her own happiness and dreams to support her ungrateful family in post-partition Bengal.

title: The Housemaid
description: A composer's life is thrown into turmoil after he hires a housemaid who becomes obsessed with him and his family.

title: Village of the Damned
description: In a small English village, all women of child-bearing age simultaneously become pregnant with alien children.

title: Black Sunday
description: A vengeful witch and her fiendish servant return from the grave and begin a bloody campaign to possess the body of the witch's beautiful look-alike descendant.

title: Elmer Gantry
description: A fast-talking traveling salesman teams up with a female evangelist to sell religion to small-town America.

title: The Sundowners
description: A sheep drover and his wife and son drive their herd across the Australian outback.

title: Sons and Lovers
description: A young man with artistic talent attempts to break free from his possessive mother and his life in a mining town.

title: Swiss Family Robinson
description: A Swiss family must survive being shipwrecked on a deserted island.

title: House of Usher
description: A man arrives at the ancestral home of his fiancée, Roderick Usher, to find that the family is cursed.

title: The Alamo
description: In 1836, a small band of soldiers sacrifice their lives in hopeless combat against a massive army in order to prevent a tyrant from smashing the new Republic of Texas.

title: Pollyanna
description: A young girl comes to an embittered town and confronts its attitude with her determination to see the best in life.

title: Butterfield 8
description: A Manhattan call girl falls in love with a wealthy married man, but their pasts threaten to destroy them.

title: Ocean's 11
description: Danny Ocean gathers a group of his World War II compatriots to pull off the ultimate Las Vegas heist.

title: Exodus
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture
description: The theme is the founding of the state of Israel. The action begins on a ship filled with Jewish immigrants bound for Israel who are being off loaded on Cyprus.

title: Wild River
description: A TVA administrator comes to rural Tennessee to oversee the building of a dam, but encounters opposition from the local people, in particular a widow who refuses to sell her land.

title: Midnight Lace
description: A young American woman is terrorized by threatening telephone calls and menacing encounters in London.

title: The Unforgiven
description: The neighbors of a frontier family turn on them when it is suspected that their adopted daughter was stolen from the local Kiowa tribe.

title: Home from the Hill
description: The story of the conflict between a wealthy landowner, his wife, and their two sons, one legitimate and one illegitimate.

title: Hell to Eternity
description: The true story of Marine Guy Gabaldon, who was raised by a Japanese-American family and later captured hundreds of Japanese soldiers during WWII.

title: Sink the Bismarck!
description: The British Royal Navy hunts down the Nazi battleship Bismarck during World War II.

title: The League of Gentlemen
description: A disgruntled army colonel recruits a group of former officers to pull off a bank robbery.

title: Never on Sunday
description: An American scholar tries to steer a Greek prostitute toward a moral life, but she has other ideas.

title: Comanche Station
description: A man searches for his wife who was abducted by Comanches, but finds another woman in need of rescue.

title: Sergeant Rutledge
description: A black sergeant in the U.S. Cavalry is court-martialed for the rape and murder of a white woman and the murder of her father.

title: The World of Suzie Wong
description: An American artist in Hong Kong falls in love with a beautiful Chinese prostitute.

title: North to Alaska
description: During the Alaskan Gold Rush, a prospector agrees to pick up his partner's fiancée in Seattle, but brings back a lovely substitute instead.

title: G.I. Blues
description: A soldier in West Germany bets his fellow G.I.s that he can date a beautiful nightclub dancer who is known for being "ice cold".

title: Cinderfella
description: When his father dies, a poor man is left at the mercy of his snobbish stepmother and her two no-good sons.

title: The Bellboy
description: Stanley is a mute bellboy at the Fontainebleau Hotel in Miami Beach, who performs his job with total incompetence.

title: The Little Shop of Horrors
description: A clumsy young man nurtures a plant and discovers that it's a bloodthirsty plant, forcing him to kill to feed it.

title: Beat Girl
description: A rebellious teenager discovers that her stepmother was a stripper in Paris and gets involved with the beatnik crowd.

title: The 1,000 Eyes of Dr. Mabuse
description: A reporter and a police inspector investigate a series of murders and disappearances connected to the Hotel Luxor.

title: Jigoku
description: After a hit-and-run accident, a theology student is tormented by his conscience and descends into a living hell.

title: Tunes of Glory
description: A popular commanding officer of a Scottish regiment engages in a battle of wills with his strict new replacement.

title: The Grass Is Greener
description: An English Earl and his wife open their manor house to tourists, but trouble starts when an American oil tycoon enters the picture.

title: It Started in Naples
description: An American lawyer goes to Naples to settle his late brother's estate and discovers he has a nephew being raised by a cabaret singer.

title: Strangers When We Meet
description: A successful architect and a beautiful housewife, both married to others, begin an affair that threatens to destroy their families.

title: Conspiracy of Hearts
description: Nuns in an Italian convent during WWII smuggle Jewish children out of an internment camp.

title: Macario
description: A poor woodcutter dreams of eating a whole turkey alone, but he is visited by the Devil, God, and Death.
